question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. woman in white
B. blue bowl
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The woman in white is positioned further back in the room, behind the counter and to the right, while the blue bowl is on the counter in the foreground, making its depth clearly closer to the camera.
